attributes.action: Have a Parliamentary debate and vote on whether to accept the referendum vote.
attributes.additional_details: We are a representative democracy.  The vote was advisory.  Use your judgement and your integrity.
attributes.background: Our parliamentary representatives should recall the advice of Burke and others such as Attlee then assert their sovereignty by themselves debating and deciding on the question put at the referendum. Move "This House accepts the advisory nature of the referendum vote"
